entry.title: Hexo + next 定制个性化酷站
entry.content: Github + Hexo + Next + 你 打造一个个人风格的网站 创建或使用github账号 新建一个xxx.github.io(xxx与github用户名相同)的仓库. 生成并添加SSH-KEY 本地安装git 123456789101112131415161718192021$ ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "你的邮箱"Generating public/private rsa key pair.Enter file in which to save the key (/home/fdipzone/.ssh/id_rsa): 这里输入要生成的文件名Enter passphrase (empty for no passphrase): 这里输入密码 Enter same passphrase again: 这里重复输入密码Your identification has been saved in /home/xxx/.ssh/id_rsa.Your public key has been saved in /home/xxx/.ssh/id_rsa.pub.The key fingerprint is:f2:76:c3:6b:26:10:14:fc:43:e0:0c:4d:51:c9:a2:b0 fdipzone@ubuntuThe key's randomart image is:+--[ RSA 2048]----+| .+=*.. || . += + || o oo+ || E . . o || ..S. || .o . || .o + || ...oo || +. |+-----------------+ 将xxx.rsa.pub里的文件全复制下来，粘贴到github SSH-KEY添加页面的Key栏下，title自定义，保存。 本地安装Node.js和Hexo 安装Node.js 安装hexo 1npm install npm install -g hexo-cli 搭建博客初始化安装好 Hexo 后，先任意目录新建个文件夹，名字可以为 blog，然后进入这个文件夹，输入命令： 12# 所在目录：~/blog/hexo init 等待下载安装完成后,输入: 1234# 所在目录：~/blog/hexo ghexo s 或者 hexo s -p 3001(指定一个端口，默认是4000，如果4000已被占用可以加-p参数) 然后浏览器访问点开 http://localhost:4000/ ，恭喜你！已经在本地搭建好博客了，默认主题是landscape。接下来我们更换Next主题以及部署到github Pages。 安装 Git 部署插件在站点文件夹根目录blog下输入以下命令： 12# 所在目录： ~/blog/npm install hexo-deployer-git --save 然后在根目录下的站点配置文件修改相关部署参数： 1234567891011121314# 文件位置： ~/blog/_config.yml# URL# 请将前缀换成你自己的url: https://datapsyco.github.io/.........# Deployment# 将地址换成你的deploy: type: git repository: https://github.com/datapsyco/datapsyco.github.io.git branch: master 将其中的datapsyco改成你的 Github 注册的帐号名就行，然后执行下面的命令： 1234567# 所在目录： ~/blog/hexo cleanhexo g # generatehexo d # deploy#或者使用hexo clean后使用hexo g -d 输入你的 Github 的用户名和密码，成功后复制https://账户名.github.io/到浏览器打开就行。嘿！你的博客就搭好了~ 下载Next主题12# 当前目录: ~/blog/git clone https://github.com/iissnan/hexo-theme-next themes/next 修改主题修改站点配置文件,将主题theme参数改成 next 123# 文件位置： ~/blog/~config.yml## Themes: https://hexo.io/thems/theme: next 修改站点配置文件添加站点标题、描述、作者、网站语言、时区等配置: 123456789# 文件位置： ~/blog/_config.yml# Site# Sitetitle: DataPsycosubtitle: Data Code Lifedescription: No Data No Life~author: datapsycolanguage: zh-Hanstimezone: Asia/Shanghai Next主题配置修改next主题配置文件，更多详细配置，请查阅Next官方文档。 主题配置文件和站点配置文件名字都叫_config.yml,但是主题配置文件在~/blog/themes/next/_config.yml。修改时请多留意 修改网站标志favicon 直接去 https://realfavicongenerator.net 上传一张符合的图片 选项弄好后，下载压缩包，解压复制粘贴到`~/blog/source/images/ 里（没有images文件夹自己建） 最后记得要稍微改下文件名，与下面的保持一致(解压下来的问价没有带next,而默认有next那是next的标志) 12345678910111213141516# 当前目录: ~/blog/themes/next/_config.yaml# To get or check favicons visit: https://realfavicongenerator.net# Put your favicons into `hexo-site/source/` (recommend) or `hexo-site/themes/next/source/images/` directory.# Default NexT favicons placed in `hexo-site/themes/next/source/images/` directory.# And if you want to place your icons in `hexo-site/source/` root directory, you must remove `/images` prefix from pathes.# For example, you put your favicons into `hexo-site/source/images` directory.# Then need to rename & redefine they on any other names, otherwise icons from Next will rewrite your custom icons in Hexo.favicon: small: /images/favicon-16x16.png # 注意：默认是images/favicon-16x16-next.png, 替换成你的，下面也是 medium: /images/favicon-32x32.png apple_touch_icon: /images/apple-touch-icon.png safari_pinned_tab: /images/logo.svg android_manifest: /images/manifest.json ms_browserconfig: /images/browserconfig.xml 关键词、页脚设置将相关的参数换成你的 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031# 当前目录: ~/blog/themes/next/_config.yamlkeywords: "datapsyco, cgdeeplearn, python, spark, data science, blog, 博客, 数据, 机器学习, Hexo"# Set rss to false to disable feed link.# Leave rss as empty to use site's feed link.# Set rss to specific value if you have burned your feed already.rss:footer: # Specify the date when the site was setup. # If not defined, current year will be used. #since: 2015 since: 2017 # Icon between year and copyright info. icon: heart # If not defined, will be used `author` from Hexo main config. copyright: # ------------------------------------------------------------- # Hexo link (Powered by Hexo). powered: true theme: # Theme & scheme info link (Theme - NexT.scheme). enable: true # Version info of NexT after scheme info (vX.X.X). version: true # ------------------------------------------------------------- # Any custom text can be defined here. #custom_text: Hosted by <a target="_blank" href="https://pages.github.com">GitHub Pages</a> 设置菜单布局1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829# 菜单设置 || 菜单图标设置# 项目换行可以更改显示顺序# 如果这个项前会显示 .menu# 解决方法：编辑 ~/blog/themes/next/languages 下的相应文件# 比如添加一个“留言”菜单，站点配置文件的 language 是 zh-Hans# 则编辑 zh-Hans.yml，在 menu: 项内添加一行 留言: 留言# 注意空格，且符号 : 为英文字符！menu: home: / || home archives: /archives/ || archive categories: /categories/ || th tags: /tags/ || tags top: /top/ || signal about: /about/ || futbol-o #schedule: /schedule/ || calendar #sitemap: /sitemap.xml || sitemap #commonweal: /404/ || heartbeat# Enable/Disable menu icons.# 是否开启菜单图标menu_icons: enable: true# Schemes # 选择一个你喜欢的scheme布局scheme: Muse#scheme: Mist#scheme: Pisces#scheme: Gemini 侧边栏sidebar设置侧边栏社交链接,链接图标,友情链接,头像等 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384858687888990# Usage: `Key: permalink || icon`# 侧栏社交链接设置，与上面菜单差不多，要生效记得把前面的 # 去掉# 图标可以到http://fontawesome.io/icons/去找自己喜欢的social: GitHub: https://github.com/datapsyco || github #E-Mail: mailto:yourname@gmail.com || envelope #Google: https://plus.google.com/yourname || google #Twitter: https://twitter.com/yourname || twitter #FB Page: https://www.facebook.com/yourname || facebook #VK Group: https://vk.com/yourname || vk #StackOverflow: https://stackoverflow.com/yourname || stack-overflow #YouTube: https://youtube.com/yourname || youtube #Instagram: https://instagram.com/yourname || instagram #Skype: skype:yourname?call|chat || skype# 侧栏社交链接图标设置social_icons: enable: true icons_only: false transition: false# Blog rolls# 侧栏友链设置# links_layout可以选择block或inlinelinks_icon: linklinks_title: 友情链接links_layout: block#links_layout: inlinelinks: 😆 网易云音乐 😆: https://music.163.com/#/user/home?id=36485986# Sidebar Avatar# in theme directory(source/images): /images/avatar.gif# in site directory(source/uploads): /uploads/avatar.gif# 侧栏头像设置# 建议放在 hexo-site/source/uploads/ 里（没有自己建）# 这样可以避免更新 NexT 主题的时候遇到麻烦avatar: /uploads/avatar.gif# Sidebar Avatar# in theme directory(source/images): /images/avatar.gif# in site directory(source/uploads): /uploads/avatar.gif#avatar: /images/avatar.gifavatar: /uploads/avatar.gif# Table Of Contents in the Sidebartoc: enable: true # Automatically add list number to toc. number: true # If true, all words will placed on next lines if header width longer then sidebar width. wrap: false# Creative Commons 4.0 International License.# http://creativecommons.org/# Available: by | by-nc | by-nc-nd | by-nc-sa | by-nd | by-sa | zero#creative_commons: by-nc-sa#creative_commons:sidebar: # Sidebar Position, available value: left | right (only for Pisces | Gemini). position: left #position: right # Sidebar Display, available value (only for Muse | Mist): # - post expand on posts automatically. Default. # - always expand for all pages automatically # - hide expand only when click on the sidebar toggle icon. # - remove Totally remove sidebar including sidebar toggle. # 侧栏显示方式，post 代表只有点进一篇文章内 # 且文章有目录，侧栏才会弹出显示 display: post #display: always #display: hide #display: remove # Sidebar offset from top menubar in pixels (only for Pisces | Gemini). # 只对 Pisces 和 Gemini 设计版式有效！ offset: 12 # Back to top in sidebar (only for Pisces | Gemini). # 只对 Pisces 和 Gemini 设计版式有效！ b2t: false # Scroll percent label in b2t button. # 在回到顶部按钮里显示阅读百分比 scrollpercent: true # Enable sidebar on narrow view (only for Muse | Mist). # 移动端显示侧栏，只对 Muse 和 Mist 设计版式有效！ onmobile: true Post 设置12 Misc Theme 设置字体设置第三方服务设置mathjaxlivere 评论google_analyticsrating 评分leancloud访问量busuanzi_count 访问统计local search 搜索Tags 设置主题的标签样式，有 note、label、tabs 三种 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829# External URL with BASE64 encrypt & decrypt.# Usage: {% exturl text url "title" %}# Alias: {% extlink text url "title" %}exturl: false# Note tag (bs-callout).note: # Note tag style values: # - simple bs-callout old alert style. Default. # - modern bs-callout new (v2-v3) alert style. # - flat flat callout style with background, like on Mozilla or StackOverflow. # - disabled disable all CSS styles import of note tag. style: flat icons: true border_radius: 3 # Offset lighter of background in % for modern and flat styles (modern: -12 | 12; flat: -18 | 6). # Offset also applied to label tag variables. This option can work with disabled note tag. light_bg_offset: 0# Label tag.label: true# Tabs tag.tabs: enable: true transition: tabs: true labels: true border_radius: 0 进一步自定义设置注脚npm install hexo-footnotes --save markdown示例 12345678910basic footnote1here is an inline footnote[^2](inline footnote)and another one3and another one4[^1]: basic footnote content[^3]: paragraphfootnotecontent[^4]: footnote content with some [markdown](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Markdown) 优化网页样式布局请参阅hexo next自定义页面样式布局
